results.title: Effect of Metformin on Premature Luteinization and Pregnancy Outcomes in Intracytoplasmic Sperm Injection-Fresh Embryo Transfer Cycles: A Randomized Double-Blind Controlled Trial
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ could be used in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with potential @<m>DISEASE_Leydig_Cell_Hypoplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C562567 @@@PL@@@ to improve fresh cycle outcomes by preventing @<m>DISEASE_Leydig_Cell_Hypoplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C562567 @@@PL@@@ (Registration number: NCT03088631).

citations.NLM: Hussein RS, Elnashar I, Amin AF, Zhao Y, Abdelmagied AM, Abbas AM, Abdelaleem AA, Farghaly TA, Abdalmageed OS, Youssef AA, Badran E, Abou-Taleb HA. PMID: 33687163

results.title: Revisiting debates of premature luteinization and its effect on assisted reproductive technology outcome.
results.text_hl: The key elements in preventing @<m>DISEASE_Leydig_Cell_Hypoplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C562567 @@@PL@@@ include individualization of ovarian stimulation according to @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@'s ovarian reserve, proper ovulation trigger timing, and use of medications such as corticosteroids and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Hussein RS, Elnashar I, Amin AF, Abou-Taleb HA, Abbas AM, Abdelmageed AM, Farghaly T, Zhao Y. Revisiting debates of premature luteinization and its effect on assisted reproductive technology outcome. J Assist Reprod Genet. 2019 Nov;36(11):2195-2206. PMID: 31650455

results.title: Effects of metformin on inappropriate LH release in women with polycystic ovarian syndrome and insulin resistance.
results.text_hl: Effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on inappropriate @<m>DISEASE_Leydig_Cell_Hypoplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C562567 @@@LH release@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@polycystic ovarian syndrome@@@ and @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin resistance@@@.
